title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No.
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Precautionary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Precautionary 
Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2021 (Revocation) Regulations 2022 and 
come into operation on 29 April 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (precautionary confinement birds) regulation 2021 (revocation) regulation 2022 come operation 29 april 2022

title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No.
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds) Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds) Regulations 

2021 are revoked. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

26 April, 2022. 

JUNE FANNING, 

An officer authorised to authenticate the official Seal of the 
Minister. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th April, 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [203] 3

title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The effect of these Regulations is to revoke the Avian Influenza (Precautionary 
Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2021
